name: Gambler's Vice
description:
Gambler’s Vice is a dice-rolling auto-battler where players collect Dice Dudes and cards to fight against other gamblers. Use your glass-trapped Dice Dudes to fight your battles for you! You better hope you roll better than they do, or you’ll lose your chance at the winner’s pot!

Note: Just like with gambling, there’s no way to win :)

How to Play:

1. Select a Dice Dude and click a square on your side of the playing field to place the dice.

2. One all Dice Dudes are placed, select a dice, and then click an opposing row to assign that dice to attack that row.

3. Dice Dudes can only hit the first enemy in a row, and only the first dice dude in any row can attack.

4. The top left number represents health

5. The top right number is current attack strength. This gets rerolled every turn.

6. Clicking a card and then clicking a Dice Dude applies the card’s effects to that dice. Cards are single use and can be bought in the shop.

7. Have fun!

Cards

Attack
Increase the dice’s damage by 1 

 Attack+
Increase the dice’s damage by 2

Armor
Give the dice 1 armor (this can go above the dices max health)

Armor+
Give the dice 2 armor  (this can go above the dice’s max health)

Heal
Heal the dice’s health by 1 up to max health

Reroll
Reroll the attack of one dice

Reroll +
Select two targets to attack. The second attack will be rerolled before attacking
